choiceresponse.p: Here is the code for a quick image map. It's a simplified version of our example from earlier in this section, with less compact formatting.

pre.code: The Stare Zone allows deep contemplation of the world. It is also used to indicate emotions such as hunger, comfort, and total insanity. Located in the middle of the head.

choiceresponse.label: What can you remove from this code and still have it display a pop-up?

div.p: You can get away with a pretty slimmed-down version. You can even get rid of the "rect" shape, because "rect" is the default! The code above is simply the full code that we got from our image map creation service; not all of it is required.
Of course, you don't want to remove some of these, like the alt text and the title. Those are important for accessibility.
